name: FX Forecast

screenshots.caption: Taking difference of Close Price and Open Price from 3 to 5 candlesticks from chart to forecast for the next candlestick.
Add the difference and press Add button for the candlestick.

Repeat the process to add multiple observations 3 to 6 observations are good to go based on getting the good result. After adding values press Start Match Search. Don't add only one value and press Start Match Search.
Decision for the next candlestick based on historical data and Subdivision calculations
Pressing Matched Data button would open to the matched data view.

short_description:
FxForcast can determine and forecast the upcoming candlestick either it will be bullish (upward) or bearish(downward) by using 10 years data from 2000 to 2010. FxForecast matches the current input candlestick record and forecast for upcoming candlestick using data of different currencies. We have standardized data to match for any currency by the difference of Close Price and Open Price. If the value of the candlestick is negative we recognize it as Bearish or Downward if the value of the difference is positive we recognize the candlestick as Bullish or Upward.
FxForecast can forecast from 1 minute chart to 1 hour chart as we are updating the software in our upcoming version. Results are all based on historical data but it is your stake to make final decision. Watch out for upcoming news for more accurate decision. FxForecast works fine normally or low weighed news but for news making high difference in currency value better watchout for that. FxForecast will not be responsible for yo
